sentences.en: He can trespass, he can burgle.
sentences.cn: 他可以到处乱闯, 他可以偷.
他对他们提起侵害诉讼.

sentences.en: He will be prosecuted for trespass.
sentences.cn: 他将因擅闯私地而被起诉。

sentences.en: I don't want to trespass on your hospitality.
I shall trespass on your hospitality.
I won't trespass upon your time any longer.
If those youths trespass on my land again, I shall be ready for them.
sentences.cn: 要是那些年轻人再来侵犯我的土地, 我就准备收拾他们.

sentences.en: John proceeded against the man for trespass.
sentences.cn: 约翰控告那个人非法侵入.

sentences.en: May I trespass on you for that book?
sentences.cn: 请你借那本书给我好 吗 ?

sentences.en: One trespass more I must make on your patience.
Stephen Leckar has 30 minutes to represent Jones, and he tries to advance a second argument in this case: The very act of installing the GPS device on a private vehicle constitutes a trespass.
sentences.cn: 琼斯的律师斯蒂文·莱卡有30分钟时间替琼斯辩护，他又提出了一个新论点：警方在琼斯私人汽车上装跟踪器的做法本身构成“非法入侵”。

sentences.en: Such causes of action include nuisance , negligence , trespass, causation of mental distress, and strict liability.
sentences.cn: 那些诉讼原因包括公害 、 玩忽职守 、 侵权 、 精神苦恼以及地区责任.

sentences.en: The fellow has brought action against me for trespass.
sentences.cn: 那家伙控告我侵占土地.

sentences.en: The fishing boat was seized for its trespass into restricted waters.
sentences.cn: 渔船因非法侵入受限制水域而被扣押.

sentences.en: They began to organize a mass trespass.
sentences.cn: 他们开始组织大规模的侵犯.

sentences.en: This area is only for patients, visitors cannot trespass.
sentences.cn: 这是病患区, 来访者止步.

sentences.en: You could be prosecuted for trespass.
sentences.cn: 你可能会因为擅自闯入而受到起诉。

words.tran_cn: 罪过；非法侵入；过失；擅自进入

phrases.tran_cn: 侵犯；非法侵入；妨碍；打扰

trans.tran_cn: 罪过，打扰，非法进入，擅自进入，冒犯
trans.tran_en: something you have done that is morally wrong
to go onto some-one’s private land without their permission

trans.tran_cn: 侵犯， 闯入私人领地
<律>侵占，侵入，侵犯，侵害（权利等），打扰，冒犯
